thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Invitation Homes Qtrly Core FFO Per Share $0.29

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Invitation Homes Qtrly Core FFO Per Share $0.29
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Invitation Homes Inc:
* INVITATION HOMES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 40.7 PERCENT TO $330 MILLION * QTRLY FFO PER SHARE $0.13 * QTRLY AFFO PER SHARE $0.24 * QTRLY CORE FFO PER SHARE $0.29 * SEES 2018 CORE FFO PER SHARE $1.13 - $1.21
* SEES 2018 AFFO PER SHARE $0.94 - $1.02
* SEES 2018 SAME STORE NOI GROWTH 5% - 6%
* SEES 2018 SAME STORE CORE REVENUE GROWTH 4% - 5%
* SEES 2018 SAME STORE CORE OPERATING EXPENSE GROWTH 2% - 3%
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06, REVENUE VIEW $331.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.22, REVENUE VIEW $1.71 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
